name: Hold the Line (itch) (Poesbroek, Koelekikkers.nl, EvolvedDitmur, OppoOtis, MrSinga)
name_original: Hold the Line (itch) (Poesbroek, Koelekikkers.nl, EvolvedDitmur, OppoOtis, MrSinga)
description:
This is a VR experience where you have to eavesdrop on conversations to check if someone is talking about something criminal.  And if they do you have to press the report button. But some conversations aren't as black and white as you think, So be careful.  

The goal of the game:

You have to report criminal calls while holding an antenna to get a clear signal. While this is happening you get personal phone calls on your personal phone, these might help you find criminals. Unfortunately, you only have two hands so you can't hold two phones while also holding the antenna. So you have to choose.

Global game Jam 2022:

This game is made for the global game jam 2022, We jammed in the Netherlands! So there might be some bugs due to the lack of playtesting.
